Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.) ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Boots of Mobility
Boots.plaintext: Greatly enhances Movement Speed when out of combat
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes.

Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Sorcery
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes. Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.
Endgame Items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).
Endgame Items.name: Void Staff
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).

Endgame Items.description:
+60 Ability Power
+25 Magic Resist
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Restores 30% of maximum Mana on kill or assist.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Restores 2% of missing Mana every 5 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Athene's Unholy Grail
Endgame Items.plaintext: Restores maximum Mana on kill or assist
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +60 Ability Power +25 Magic Resist +20% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: Restores 30% of maximum Mana on kill or assist. UNIQUE Passive - Mana Font: Restores 2% of missing Mana every 5 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name do not stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+10% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Luden's Echo
Endgame Items.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Movement Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +10% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.

(Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)
Endgame Items.name: Morellonomicon
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +20% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds. (Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+50 Armor

UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +50 Armor UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+1000 Mana
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana.
UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Seraph's Embrace
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +1000 Mana +50% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Insight: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. UNIQUE Active - Mana Shield: Consumes 20% of current Mana to grant a shield for 3 seconds that absorbs damage equal to 150 plus the amount of Mana consumed (120 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

+60 Health
+15 Ability Power

Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds.
Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.

Starting Items.description:
UNIQUE Passive: Holds 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 120 Health and 60 Mana over 12 seconds.
